name: Trifecta Sandwich
author: Farmland
summary: Our play on the famous horseshoe sandwich, Farmland-style. We gave this signature dish the works.
ingredients: 8 slices Farmland® Thick Cut Bacon, cooked
4 (8 ounce) lean ground beef patties, cooked
Beer, Sausage, Cheese Sauce (recipe to follow)
4 cups Cheddar cheese, shredded (tossed in cornstarch just until lightly coated)
Crushed dried red pepper flakes, to taste
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
directions: To serve, lay one waffle on each plate
Top with burger, sliced ham, 2 slices thick cut bacon, cheese sauce and egg
To make Beer, Sausage, Cheese Sauce, cook breakfast sausage and garlic in pot
When cooked through, add butter, mustard, red pepper flakes and cheese
Once mixed together, add Worcestershire sauce
Let cook for 5 minutes (make sure to keep stirring, so cheese does not stick to bottom of pan)
Add some more heavy cream if sauce is too thick
